description:
Neil`s older brother, Nick, arrives from Hell. Nick`s goal is to awaken the Demon King sleeping within Neil, and the tenants of room 1031 get into trouble when they get caught up in Nick`s plans. After that, Nick, who moves at his own pace and whims, spends all his time hanging out in room 1031, and Lynn burns his hands... Room 1031 becomes rowdier and rowdier by the day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Carelessly Eat Snacks with Someone`s Name Written on Them
Namae ga Hatte Aru Okashi wa Muyami ni Tabete wa Ikemasen
名前が貼ってあるお菓子は むやみに食べてはいけません
贴着名字的零食不要乱吃
